description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) to planning permission 223365FUL dated 15.02.2023 for "Conversion of existing building from 2no. flats into 9no. self-contained residential units; single storey, part 2 storey and part 3 storey, side/rear/side (wraparound) extension; creation of balconies and roof terraces to rear elevation; rear roof extension including increase in ridge height; alterations to fenestration; installation of front boundary wall; and provision of associated amenity space, car parking, refuse and cycle storage". Amendment seeks alterations to the size and positioning of rear fenestration; omission of two windows at lower ground floor level and insertion of one additional velux rooflight to north flank elevation; level changes to side passage and repositioning of approved access gate; repositioning of rooflight to south flank elevation; provision of further detail in relation to construction methodology with reference to the front facade
decision_conditions: The insertion of one additional velux rooflight to north flank elevation would not constitute a non-material amendment to the original planning permission 223365FUL dated 15.02.2023. As such, the proposed change would not fall within the remit of Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
